Hi all,

The heat transfer function through a wall dividing a reactor
and a=
 resorvoir can have HT as a function of reactor temperature and 
fixed wall=
 area. A time based HT function is also possible. The wall
area cannot be v=
aried over time.

I have a zeroD piston simulation in Cantera with the wall=
 acting
as the piston crown.

Does anyone know if it is possible to simulat=
e a varying wall area,
without modifying the source code. (The time based H=
T function could
be used if the reservoir temperature is accessible at each=
 time step).
Does anyone know if this is possible. 

Thanks,
Adam.
